page.title: 15 V.G MIDDLE SCHOOL (1)
page.content: Valley Gardens was opened as secondary school on Tuesday 9th July 1957 at 2:30 PM by G.R Hanson,Registrar of Ki- -ngs College,Newcastle Upon Tyne.It was built by Hastie D.Burton LTD.The school changed from a secondary to a middle in september 1973.The school comprises ; the main building ,mobile a first year block which was built later in the sum- -mer 1974.The main school has 57 rooms, 17 normal classrooms,2 craftrooms,2 laboratories,8 WC,17 storerooms,1 libr- -ary,1 kitchen,1 head and secretaries room,an art room,2 changing rooms,1 hall and gym,1 staff room and resources centre.The first year block has 5 clas- -srooms,4 WC and 2 resources centres + 1 heads room.The school has pupils aged 9 to 13 with a 5 form entry and 4 year groups with 34 teachers each year group having ;1st=140,2nd=148,3rd=169,4th=168 ,a total of 625 pupils.
